Just Try for Jperf ...might be useful.

"J. B. Rainsberger" wrote:

> Rakesh wrote:
>
> > Hi,
> >
> > I have overridden junit.textui.TestRunner class, and put a infinite loop
> > in that class.
> > It is to repeat my functional test cases in one GUI.
> > Let me know what do you think on this, as I am not sure how good or bad
> > it is.
>
> <snip />
>
> > Any comments/suggestions are welcome.
>
> Well, it works, and that's all that counts for now. The only question is
> how changes in JUnit will affect you. I don't know about that. The only
> thing I do not like about the solution is that it duplicates business
> logic in the text-based test runner, and that means that when the text
> runner changes, you will have to change, too.
>
> But if it is not a problem in the meantime, then well done!
> --
